channel.title: [317] How To Make A Person Open The Client and then takes you to your website
channel.description:
Hey Guys This is my first tutorial :P:
[u]What I Have Tested On:[/u] [b]-ExRendum's Client[/b]
Steps To Do This:
1.Download The Client And Extract On To Your Desktop First Off
2.Ok Open the client folders and scroll down and you will see a program called "Run"
3.Right Click On The "Run" File And you will see this code
[code]@echo off java -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui[/code]
4.All Right so change the code to this:
@echo off [code]start http://(Your Website URL Here)" java -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui[/code] Yes The (Your Website URL Here means put your website adress there)
5.Once added that code save the file and close the .txt file
6.Scroll down and there should be a program called Compile, Compile the client and the run
7.Then once you are running it should automaticly take you to internet Explorer (Or What ever your main browser is) and it will take you to your website and run the client
Hope this tuturoail helped and here is the link for the ExRendum Client.
Uploading Pictures Later because i am uploading onto Photobucket

item.title: [317] How To Make A Person Open The Client and then takes you to your website
item.dc:creator: @Spy2805 Spy2805
item.description:
@Spy2805 wrote:

Hey Guys This is my first tutorial :P:

What I Have Tested On:
-ExRendum’s Client

Steps To Do This:

1.Download The Client And Extract On To Your Desktop First Off

2.Ok Open the client folders and scroll down and you will see a program called “Run”

3.Right Click On The “Run” File And you will see this code

@echo off java -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui

4.All Right so change the code to this:

@echo off

start http://(Your Website URL Here)" java -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui
Yes The (Your Website URL Here means put your website adress there)

5.Once added that code save the file and close the .txt file

6.Scroll down and there should be a program called Compile, Compile the client and the run

7.Then once you are running it should automaticly take you to internet Explorer (Or What ever your main browser is) and it will take you to your website and run the client

Hope this tuturoail helped and here is the link for the ExRendum Client.

Uploading Pictures Later because i am uploading onto Photobucket
